name: Somewhere Out There
description:
Odyssey presents a sci-fi themed exploration game with two characters, Jet and Ari, that posses unique abilities, including hacking, platforming, and stealth. Find the way out in space on a quest to find their parents. Windows and Mac builds included.

Features

Two characters, both of which are present in the game scene and possess different abilities. Jet can hack terminals, Ari can jump and platform.

Three stages, with different challenges for the two characters to overcome with their abilities.

Hacking Minigame
